column1: Scottish Vacant and Derelict Land Survey (SVDLS) Site Register 2024
The table is a register of vacant and derelict sites and includes a variety of information about those sites in 2024.

Total sites on the register number 3,154 and include 93 urban vacant sites in settlements with a population under 2,000.
These 93 sites are not included in the main figures in the SVDLS 2024 statistical publication but are reported separately in Annex Table 2.
